title: Creative Writing: Short Stories and Narrative Techniques

vocab.definition: Methods writers use to tell their stories effectively
The perspective from which a story is told
A story told using 'I' and 'me' by a character in the story
A story told using 'he,' 'she,' and 'they' by a narrator outside the story
The problem or struggle that drives a story forward

teachingNotes: Practice writing in different points of view. Discuss different types of conflict (internal vs. external). Encourage creative story ideas while maintaining good structure.
